@notice Event emitted when a member of the DAO executes a ragequit with all or parts of the member's shares/loot.
@notice default fallback function to prevent from sending ether to the contract.

@notice Event emitted when a member of the DAO executes a ragequit with all or parts of the member's shares/loot.
@notice default fallback function to prevent from sending ether to the contract.

ragequit(address,uint256,uint256,address.details: The sum of sharesToBurn and lootToBurn have to be greater than zero.The member can not be in jail to execute a ragequit.The member becomes an inactive member of the DAO once all the shares/loot are burned.If the member provides an invalid/not allowed token, the entire processed is reverted.

params.dao: The dao address that the member is part of.
params.lootToBurn: The amount of loot of the member that must be converted into funds.
params.sharesToBurn: The amount of shares of the member that must be converted into funds.
params.tokens: The array of tokens that the funds should be sent to.

MemberRagequit(address,uint256,uint256,u.notice: Event emitted when a member of the DAO executes a ragequit with all or parts of the member's shares/loot.

ragequit(address,uint256,uint256,address.notice: Allows a member or advisor of the DAO to opt out by burning the proportional amount of shares/loot of the member.Anyone is allowed to call this function, but only members and advisors that have shares are able to execute the entire ragequit process.
